entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Paulatuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Paulatuk Airport 7:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -21.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -24.3°C
Wind: SSE 49 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then periods of snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
